---
title: 'Toolik Chlorophyl Levels Data Summary'
output: html_document
---

``` {r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(skimr)
```

## Read in data and begin to summarize it's contents

``` {r include=TRUE}
# Read in data
toolik_chlorophyll <- read_csv(here::here('data', 'data-raw', 'toolik_chlorophyll.csv'), na = '.')

# General Summary
skimr::skim(toolik_chlorophyll)

# Dimensions
dim(toolik_chlorophyll)
names(toolik_chlorophyll)

# Initiate clean up of data names
toolik_chlorophyll <- toolik_chlorophyll |> clean_names()

# Log new Names
names(toolik_chlorophyll)
toolik_chlorophyll$active_chl_a_ug_l


# Plot chlorophyll concentration versus measurement depth
ggplot(data = toolik_chlorophyll, aes(x = active_chl_a_ug_l, y = depth)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = depth), show.legend = FALSE ) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = round(seq(from = 0, to = 9, by = 0.5),1)) +
  xlab('Chlorophyll concentration (ug/l)') +
  theme_minimal()
```
